name: NEON (itch) (PeaceForever)
description:
Well I can't take all of the credit in making this game. Apparently Babies made it, Yeah.

You should consider wearing glasses cause the glow might make you blind. With excess glow and weird physics I present to you this shitty game, NEON.

MUSIC BY - 8-bit march Twin Musicom - twinmusicom.org
